casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rogelio L. JUAREZ. No. 567P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Derrick C. Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*398The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of October 2006 by Defendant in Arrest of Judgment:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
